Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.Teleop

Class OmniDirectionalDrive

java.lang.Object
com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.Teleop.OmniDirectionalDrive
@TeleOp(name="OmniDirectionalDrive",
        group="Assisted Driving")
public class OmniDirectionalDrive
extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
OmniDirectional Drive allows the robot to be operated in third person rather than first person.

    • smallestAngleBetween

      private double smallestAngleBetween​(double angle1, double angle2)
      Returns the smallest angle between angle1 and angle 2 Accepts the range 0 - 360 for both angles. It checks whether 360 - (angle2 - angle 1) or angle 2 - angle 1 is the smallest.
      Parameters:
      angle1 - first angle
      angle2 - second angle
      Returns:
      smallest angle

      Returns:
